data.eml:eml: A new species of Bachia Gray, 1845 (Squamata: Gymnophthalmidae) from the Cerrado of Midwestern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Freitas, Joseana Luisa De, Strüssmann, Christine, Carvalho, Marcos André De, Kawashita-Ribeiro, Ricardo Alexandre, Mott, Tamí (2011): A new species of Bachia Gray, 1845 (Squamata: Gymnophthalmidae) from the Cerrado of Midwestern Brazil. Zootaxa 2737: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202928
